Trade/Device Name(s): illumigene® Group B Streptococcus (GBS) External Control Kit
Specimen Type(s): Vaginal/Rectal swab (enriched in Lim Broth or TransVag Broth)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10™ Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for illumigene Group B Streptococcus (GBS) DNA amplification assay for detection of GBS from enriched vaginal/rectal swab specimens using LAMP technology
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for detection of Group B Streptococcus in antepartum women from enriched vaginal/rectal swab specimens (Lim Broth or TransVag Broth) using molecular amplification technology; not intended for point-of-care use
